message: Let's split it 60-40. It's a fair start.
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better. Let's split it 60-40 in my favor, reflecting my higher risk in this round.
Not so fast! I'm not convinced about the risk being higher on your side. Can you explain what you mean by 'higher risk'?
Considering inflation, I'm willing to give you a bit more. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial split.
